    • Method Detail

      • getSuggestions

        Suggester.Suggestions getSuggestions​(Collection<String> projects,
                                     SuggesterQuery suggesterQuery,
                                     org.apache.lucene.search.Query query)
        Returns suggestions based on the provided parameters.
        Parameters:
        projects - projects for which to provide suggestions
        suggesterQuery - query for which suggestions should be provided, e.g. PrefixQuery
        query - query that restricts suggesterQuery. Can be null. If specified then the suggester query is considered to be complex because it takes more resources to find the proper suggestions.
        Returns:
        suggestions to be displayed

      • refresh

        void refresh()
        Refreshes the suggester based on the new configuration.

      • rebuild

        void rebuild()
        Rebuild suggester data structures. This is a subset of what refresh does.

      • rebuild

        void rebuild​(String project)
        Rebuilds suggester data structures for given project. This is a subset of what refresh does.
        Parameters:
        project - project name

      • waitForRebuild

        void waitForRebuild​(long timeout,
                    TimeUnit unit)
             throws InterruptedException
        Wait for rebuild. For testing.
        Parameters:
        timeout - timeout to wait for
        unit - timeout unit
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • waitForInit

        void waitForInit​(long timeout,
                 TimeUnit unit)
          throws InterruptedException
        Wait for the initialization. For testing.
        Parameters:
        timeout - timeout to wait for
        unit - timeout unit
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • delete

        void delete​(String project)
        Deletes all suggester data for the project.
        Parameters:
        project - name of the project to delete

      • onSearch

        void onSearch​(Iterable<String> projects,
              org.apache.lucene.search.Query q)
        Increments most popular completion data according to the passed parameters.
        Parameters:
        projects - projects that were searched
        q - search query

      • increaseSearchCount

        boolean increaseSearchCount​(String project,
                            org.apache.lucene.index.Term term,
                            int value)
        Increments most popular completion data for the specified term by value.
        Parameters:
        project - project to update
        term - term to update
        value - value by which to change the data, represents how many times was the term searched
        Returns:
        false if update failed, otherwise true

      • increaseSearchCount

        boolean increaseSearchCount​(String project,
                            org.apache.lucene.index.Term term,
                            int value,
                            boolean waitForLock)
        Increments most popular completion data for the specified term by value.
        Parameters:
        project - project to update
        term - term to update
        value - value by which to change the data, represents how many times was the term searched
        waitForLock - wait for lock
        Returns:
        false if update failed, otherwise true

      • getPopularityData

        List<Map.Entry<org.apache.lucene.util.BytesRef,​Integer>> getPopularityData​(String project,
                                                                                 String field,
                                                                                 int page,
                                                                                 int pageSize)
        Returns the searched terms sorted according to their popularity.
        Parameters:
        project - project for which to return the data
        field - field for which to return the data
        page - which page of data to retrieve
        pageSize - number of results to return
        Returns:
        list of terms with their popularity

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the underlying service explicitly.
